brand.name: Santiago Vazquez
brand.title: Full-Stack Engineer
brand.tagline: Building products that scale — from municipal AI systems to IoT solutions

aestheticPhilosophy.overview: A tactile, pastel-forward design system inspired by ceramic studio aesthetics. The visual language balances warmth and professionalism, creating an inviting yet sophisticated atmosphere.

base.name: Cream
base.rationale: Warm off-white that feels like quality paper or ceramic, avoiding sterile pure white

surface.name: Parchment
surface.rationale: Subtle elevation for cards and sections, maintaining warmth while creating depth

accent.name: Terracotta
accent.rationale: Warm, earthy tone that conveys craftsmanship and human touch. Primary action color.

tension.name: Sage
tension.rationale: Complementary cool tone for balance. Used for tags, secondary highlights, and status indicators.

ink.name: Charcoal
ink.rationale: Soft black that's easier on eyes than pure black, maintaining the warm aesthetic

headline.rationale: Variable serif with optical sizing. Adds personality and warmth to headlines while maintaining readability. The slight quirkiness reflects innovation.

data.rationale: Clean monospace for technical credibility. Used for labels, metadata, and code references. Creates visual contrast with the serif headlines.

textureAndDepth.grain: Subtle noise texture overlay adds tactile, handcrafted quality
textureAndDepth.shadows: Diffused, warm-tinted shadows that feel natural rather than harsh
textureAndDepth.glassMorphism: Subtle backdrop blur for elevated elements, maintaining depth without distraction

principles: Motion should feel natural and purposeful

signature.rationale: Smooth out-expo curve that feels organic and satisfying

accessibility: Screen reader friendly with proper ARIA
performance: Lazy loading for images and heavy components
